text: Rivallo IV, Prince of Brittany, Earl of Poher, (died Nov 12, 857), was a son of Saint Salomon, or Salaün, King of Brittany. He had a son called Alan, Earl of Vannes, Prince of Brittany, who died around 907. ==References== Category:Earls of Poher Category:Princes of Brittany Category:9th-century Breton people
title: Ridoredh of Vannes
